summary: The document is a memorandum from 10 August 1964, directed to the Chief of OSD/OS, concerning Vladimir RODRIGUEZ Lahera, who is staying in a safehouse in Silver Spring, Md. It seeks to verify a long-distance call made by Lahera on 7 August 1964 to a cousin in New York and requests further details about calls from the previous day, alongside the correct subscriber information for the New York phone number, which was inaccurately provided.
key_findings: Vladimir RODRIGUEZ Lahera is residing in a safehouse arranged by the Safehouse Branch, Office of Logistics.
A long-distance call to a cousin in New York was reported to have been made by Lahera on 7 August 1964.
The provided New York phone number and address are incorrect.
Verification of the call and additional information regarding calls on 6 August are requested.
